    • Method Detail

      • openScript

        java.io.InputStream openScript(nl.weeaboo.filesystem.FilePath filename)
                        throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                               java.io.IOException
        Opens the given script file as an inputstream.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If the file could not be openend.
        java.io.IOException - If an exception occurs while trying to open the script.

      • loadScript

        void loadScript(IScriptThread thread,
                nl.weeaboo.filesystem.FilePath filename)
         throws java.io.IOException,
                ScriptException
        Executes a script file.
        Parameters:
        thread - The thread to execute the script on.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an exception occurs while trying to open the script.
        ScriptException - If an exception occurs while executing the script.
